lead_paragraph: Chelsea must channel their anger properly and focus of being 'tough underdogs' when they host French champions Paris St Germain in the second leg of their last-16 Champions League tie on Wednesday, manager Guus Hiddink has said.

headline.print_headline: Hiddink Urges Anger Management for Chelsea to Beat PSG
headline.main: Hiddink Urges Anger Management for Chelsea to Beat PSG

snippet: Chelsea must channel their anger properly and focus of being 'tough underdogs' when they host French champions Paris St Germain in the second leg of their last-16 Champions League tie on Wednesday, manager Guus Hiddink has said....
